resources.string: Try to follow pieces of advice and you'll do it for sure!
Barricades and wood stakes are extremely dangerous! Barricades can't do much damage, but they are very firm. Stakes cause huge damage, but they do it only from front side.
You're in charge of the squad, consisting of thirty soldiers. The squad can be reformed into three formations: free formation, phalanx and testudo.
Relocate the squad to the reference point for the soldiers to confront the shelling frontally and block as much arrows as possible.
Close the inventory
Congratulations! Now you know the basic principles of game mechanics and can succeed in completion of difficult levels!
To put the equipment into the inventory or take it out, drag the icon of the required item to a new place.

After any soldier's death, his equipment appears on the ground. You can pick up the equipment and put it to the invetory, but its amount can't surpass the number of soldiers in your squad in one box. You can also change current equipment, if the new one is enough for all members of the squad.
The squad in the phalanx attacks everybody on its way, pushing the enemy back. Phalanx is the most suitable for defence.

The squad is formed into free formation by default. The squad is rather maneuvering in free formation, but in case of any damage the soldiers will be bewildered and won't be able to do anything. Free formation is the best for dislocation or attacking small-numbered enemy forces.
Raised shields are very efficient for shelling block, but, in this case, the squad becomes too defenceless in close combat. Shields block shelling, if the soldiers stand with their backs to missiles.
Go to the camp exit.
Go to the level exit.
Relocate this squad to the reference point
Open inventory of the squad, pushing the button in the upper right corner on the screen. (If you press this button the radius of items search will be displayed in several seconds)
You have the opportunity to view mini maps for land navigation.
Open mini map by pressing the corresponding button at the upper right. To show the point of displacement to the squad, touch the required place right on the mini map.
Open inventory
Open mini map
Other formations depend on the equipment

Phalanx keeps the line in any situation, and sometimes this skill can be rather useful. For example, to overcome formidable obstacles, you can deploy the squad sideward and force through without getting damage.
Read carefully all modifiers. In this case you won't have unpredictable outcomes of the battles!

To change the formation press the button in the upper left corner and swipe towards the appeared button, which corresponds to the desirable formation. If it's possible to reform, the squad will be reformed. The current formation is displayed on the main button.
Reform the squad into phalanx
Reform the squad into testudo
You can get detailed information on each formation and other modifiers, affecting the squad, by clicking the corresponding icon on the panels at the top of the screen.

To move in the phalanx, show direction where to go and what to look at for the squad. During the whole displacement the squad will try to turn to the indicated direction. The squad will attack everyone, who will be on its way.

To move in free formation, show direction to the squad. During the whole displacement the whole squad will be turned towards the direction. Enemies will be identified in certain areas around the indicated point. The squad will attack only identified enemies.
Handling of the squad in testudo formation is equal to handling in free formation
To have the opportunity to reform into testudo, you need to have shields. Pick up shields
To have the opportunity to reform into phalanx, you need to have spears and pikes. Pick up these spears and substitute your weapons with them.

The equipment which is put on affects the characteristics of the squad soldiers and their skill to reform into other formations. To watch the effect of the equipment, touch the required icon of the item. To close the window of the characteristics preview just touch it.

To find out about the current characteristics of the squad, press the button with the arrow on the left side of the inventory interface. To close the window of characteristics' preview, press the button once again.
Open the window of the preview of the squad characteristics preview.
Welcome to the tutorial of the main mechanics! Good luck!

To apply the charge, press the corresponding icon of the skill. The soldiers rush to the side, where your squad will be turned to, and in case of confrontation with the enemy, they will do him the damage.
These pikemen defend the territory and will try to reform into the phalanx when approaching. Apply the charge for fast approach to the enemy for pikemen not to have time to reform.

If you fail to catch the pikemen by surprise, you will suffer serious losses, but if you have the last chance of victory - retreat, provoking the pikemen to reform into free formation and chase you, then attack again. Pikemen won't have time to form the phalanx!
My congratulations! Now you've mastered the main battle techniques and know how to behave in the most difficult situations!

You are lucky at the moment! You have pilums and charge! Pilums are consumables. You can buy them in the store between the levels. You can also improve your squad skills there. The consumables, items and skills are applied in the same way. To find out how you can do it, look their description by clicking the icon in the inventory.
The enemy crossed the road. Destroy him!
Destroy the indicated enemy squad.
The enemies also have consumables and skills. These ones have pilums!
The shortest way is to the left. Go there.
The road is blocked. You should get around the camp...
The nearest way to the exit lies through the narrow passage. Go there.
It would be a good idea to reinforce your squad after the stiff battles. Go to the indicated point.
Go to the exit
To show or remove the panels of enemy squads' characteristics, press the corresponding button on the right of the screen.
Face the enemy and then reform into the phalanx. Destroy the enemy
Switch on visualization of the panel of enemy squads' characteristics.

Phalanx is a defensive formation. When retreating in phalanx facing the enemy, you will be able to hold even against superior forces. However, if you are armed with pikes, the phalanx feels great during the attack.

The passage is shut by the pikemen. If the pikemen formed the phalanx, no one has chances to confront in a straight fight against each other. There are only two variants: whether to attack them, while pikes are not lowered yet (then they won't be able to reform into the phalanx), or shoot them down from a distance (as the pikers can't use their shields)
To throw pilums to the enemy, press the button with their image and, with the finger fixed on the screen, drag it to the side of the enemy. Then take the finger off the screen.
Retreat to the indicated position and regroup
These pikemen have already formed into the phalanx. The best way to win them is to shoot them down at the distance.

Except the enemies you have neutral soldiers. They can reinforce your ranks. To reinforce your squad, reform it into free formation and single out neutral soldiers. When they come up, they will join you. The squad must be out of battle
Each mentioned characteristics has its own icon. The higher characteristics is, the larger number of icons will be visible. 1 icon - small value, 2 - mean value, 3 - large value
To find out more about your enemy, you have the panel, which shows the main characteristics of the enemy squad: his weapons, formation, skills and consumables

To move in the phalanx, show the squad where to go and to look at. During the whole displacement the squad will try to turn to the indicated direction. The squad will try to attack everybody on its way.

To move in free formation show direction to the squad. During the whole displacement the squad will try to turn to the indicated direction. Enemies will be identified in certain areas around the indicated point. The squad will attack only identified enemies.
Handling of the squad in testudo formation is equal to handling in free formation
Prevent from being trapped! Soldiers can't defend their backs. If you are trapped, more likely, you'll lose. In such situation it's better to retreat and regroup to confront the enemy.
Sometimes definitely losing situation occurs. In such case it's better to avoid fighting and quit the level. Be careful, charge can be applied only in free formation!
Reinforce the squad with new soldiers
Thus, here you'll learn the main offensive postures, usage of consumables and skills of the squad. Good luck
Congratulations! Now you've mastered all basic principles of the game and succeed in passing difficult levels!
Destroy the enemy

A very heavy squad gets heavy fines in attack and defence in the forest, for this reason you have the advantage over the enemy. However, the enemy still has strong armour and destruction power, so be careful.
The way to the exit is blocked by the enemy squad. You must destroy it. Go to the enemy squad
Go to the exit

This enemy squad is very heavy. He has the advantage even on the neutral territory, not to mention the road. To even the odds, draw the enemy into the forest. Pay attention to the panel of enemy squad characteristics, look how characteristics change under the influence of the terrain.
Draw the enemy into the forest
Go to the forest
Come back to the destroyed enemy and put on his equipment to make your squad heavy
There is a neutral camp at the top. Reinforce your camp there.
Except the neutral terrain there's the terrain, which affects the squad characteristics. All the current characteristics are displayed on the squad's panel of modificators.

Each terrain affects the squads of different heaviness in different way. For example, forest gives all the advantages of the attack and defence to light squads and fines to heavy squads. Fine for the displacement speed is imposed on all the squads.
Except the terrain, which gives advantages, there is the terrain, which imposes fines only. For example, water and dirt. Try to avoid such terrain and draw the enemy there.
The road allows to move quicker. Besides, it gives advantages to heavy squads in the attack and defence
Having heavy armor and benefits due to the road, you will easily do away with light squads of the enemy, which outnumber you. To meet light squads, come into position on the road.
Any item of the equipment item has its weight. Total weight of the equipment affects heaviness of the squad. Heaviness of your squad is displayed on the modificators panel of the squad.
Hence, here you'll find out about heaviness of the squads, terrain influence on them, as well as learn how to use the advantages and fines of the terrain. Good luck!
Pages of the store
Your gold, silver and squad experience
Settings
Tradesman
Here you can buy and sell equipment and consumables. You can see characteristics of the squad wearing equipment. You can see all opened and unopened items of equipment.
Hospital
Here you can heal wounded soldiers. (In future, you'll be able to reinforce the squad with contractors for gold )
Gymnasium
Here you can train your soldiers for new skills. Skills of the squad is one of the components of success! You shouldn't underestimate their force.
Boot camp
Here you can train soldiers, improving their main characteristics. The higher soldiers' characteristics are, the higher chances are to win the battle!
Market
Here you can exchange gold for silver or scrolls with priceless value. You also can earn gold in different ways :)
Camp
Your adventures will start from this place. Good luck! (You can also access the main menu from here..)
Go to the page Gymnasium
Buy pilums
Buy shields
Open tap page of shields
To buy or sell the item drag it with you finger here.
You can drag the equipment to the equipment zone
Consumables can be dragged to the consumables zone
Filters of equipment
All opened and unopened equipment
Equipment for sale
Consumables for sale
Characteristics of your squad with current equipment and formation
Your consumables
Your equipment
Equipment in your inventory
Condition of soldiers in your squad. Green -healthy, red - badly wounded.
Pay silver to the doctors and they heal your soldiers
Show the doctors who to treat first. If you don't have enough money to heal all of them, it can affect their future battles
Used skills of your squad
All available skills
Press the icon of the skill to highlight it and open its page
Press the icon of the highlighted skill to watch the description and characteristics of the skill
The page of chosen skill
Here you can watch the tree of skill improvement, unlock and improve the skill of the squad
To unlock the skill, study the first node in the village of improvement
To choose the unlocked skill for its use, drag it from the slot of all skills to the slot of the squad
To choose the unlocked skill, drag it from the slot of the squad skills
Unlock the skill
Choose the open skill for the use
Open the page of another skill
Open the page of the camp
To improve characteristics of the squad, press the corresponding buttons
Characteristics
Current value
The level of change after improvement
The cost of improvement
Green bar means the number of improvement levels, you've mastered out of all possible ones.
Yellow bar means the amount you've paid for the opening of a new level of improvement
